Title: India’s GSPC seeks one first-half March LNG cargo
Description: India’s state-owned Gujarat State Petroleum is seeking one cargo for delivery on Mar. 1-10 to its 5 mtpa Mundra LNG receiving terminal in India’s western state of Gujarat. The tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Kogas issues tender to buy February-March LNG cargoes
Description: Korea’s state-owned Kogas has issued a tender to buy an unspecified number of cargoes for delivery across the second-half of February and the first-half of March to its LNG receiving terminals in Korea. The tender closes tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Train 6 at Sabine Pass completes commissioning; control handed over to Cheniere
Description: The sixth train of US LNG producer Cheniere’s Sabine Pass LNG export facility in Louisiana has completed its commissioning process, with control handed over from engineering partner Bechtel to Cheniere.
Author: CK

Title: LNG ship Yiannis docks at Calcasieu Pass to load first commissioning cargo for export
Description: The 174,000 m3 Yiannis LNG tanker has docked at Venture Global’s 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass LNG export plant in Louisiana, in the US, to load the new plant’s first commissioning cargo for export.
Author: CK
